title: game wont start BugsplatRC resource dll not found!
body: i need sum help pls after i updated the last patch i joined a custom game and when the match started it crushed so i closed it and when i tried to open it again it didnt open and said bugsplatRc resuorce dll not found....pls help

replies.body:
Riot has been tracking an issue with this patch where players who have the patcher pinned (instead of the desktop shortcut) to their Windows Task Bar consistently crash/Bug Splat when they attempt to get into a game after Champ Select. They are working on a hotfix ASAP, but there is a temporary work around to get this solved:


1. Un-pin League of Legends from your task bar.

2. Repair the game by clicking the question mark icon to the top right of the patcher. Select "Repair" and let the patcher scan and repair corrupt game files. When the process is completed, you'll see the orange "Launch" button.

3. Let us know the results.

http://eune.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/template_lcu_changelog_1280x720.jpg?itok=uV6zjzTq
iam running currently windows 10 i dont have LoL binned in my task bar  and i cant reach repair coz the game doesnt even open after the logo it just says bugsplatrc resource dll not found

Thought you meant you couldn't start a match.

[Visit Heimy’s Workshop to patch these issues.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues)


http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/c/c5/Heimerdinger_PiltoverCustomsSkin_old.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20120118075912
nah i meant LoL itself QQ

It sounds like you might have corrupt game files that's causing your game and patcher to not load properly.  I agree that going over the steps in the [Patching Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) guide can help get this fixed up.  For your specific issue, I also suggest following the _force re-patch_ and _repair game file_ instructions.  Let me know if you have any issues afterward!

I have the same issues and so far I'm trying to use the patching notes on heimy's workshop. My issue so far seems to stem from when the game starts, it shows the league of legends logo with a bar underneath. But then it vanishes and it feels like an hour or more later when it says the bugsplatRC resource DLL not found.

These are the exact details.
Hey, i am having the same exact problem you have. Have you solved it?

Have u solved it I now have the same problem and I'm running on windows 10 any suggestions
